item.description:
$7 Movie Tuesdays -A Good Day to Die Hard (2013) -Please get tickets at 6:55PM. --Movie Start time 7:15PM.  We still meet at 7:00PM in Lobby to go in at 7:05PM to get good seats. Most seats are all new and very comfy!!

A Good Day to Die Hard (2013) Details: John McClane travels to Russia to help out his seemingly wayward son, Jack, only to discover that Jack is a CIA operative working to prevent a nuclear-weapons heist, causing the father and son to team up against underworld forces. Iconoclastic, take-no-prisoners cop John McClane, for the first time, finds himself on foreign soil after traveling to Moscow to help his wayward son Jack - unaware that Jack is really a highly-trained CIA operative out to stop a nuclear weapons heist. With the Russian underworld in pursuit, and battling a countdown to war, the two McClanes discover that their opposing methods make them unstoppable heroes.

 

Staring: Bruce Willis, Jai Courtney and Mary Elizabeth Winstead

MPAA Rating PG-13

Genres Action/Adventure, Sequel

--------------------------------------------------

This looks like a great movie not to be missed on the Big Screen! So take a break from your work week and watch this great movie with us, some of your new pals. This movie looks great for 2012..... It’s time to see a great movie so do not miss out! You can't beat $7!

Location: Showcase Cinemas Woburn 25 Middlesex Canal Parkway, Woburn, MA.

Meet in the lobby. Walk into the lobby go to the left side ticket counter (Note there is one on the right so do not get confused) buy your ticket turn right walk 15 feet I will be sitting down at the small tables. This is so we have an exact spot to meet.

Ciao Biagio

-------------------------------------------------------------

Note: There is a pre Movie dinner at Tudo Na Brasa 414 Main St Woburn, MA at 6 PM. Please do sign up for this dinner  seperately.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in lobby. Walk into lobby go to the left side ticket counter (Note: NOT the one on right so do not get confused) buy your ticket turn right walk 15 feet I will be sitting down at the small tables.
item.name: $7 Movie Tuesdays - A Good Day to Die Hard (2013)
